name: MealPrep
0:
”Alexa, launch meal prep”
”Alexa, open meal prep”
”Alexa, start meal prep”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: meal prep
des:
Take the guesswork out of your diet, and let Alexa prep your meals for you! 

No more expensive food systems, no more wasted produce. Simply tell Alexa your preferences (calories, macros, snack option, dessert option, food allergies, budget option), and Alexa will design a customized 3 to 5 day meal plan for you. Print your complete meal plan, shopping list, recipes, and instructions FREE from the website ActualCalorie.com

You will be given a Meal Code after you set your preferences. The Meal Code can be used at ActualCalorie.com. Go to ActualCalorie.com, click on the "Meal Prep" skill, and use your code. It's that simple!

Please leave feedback in the comments below on how to improve this skill! More foods / recipes will be added weekly.

Disclaimer: Please speak with a medical doctor before starting a new diet. This skill is for entertainment purposes only and should not be used in replace of medical advice. There is no guarantee the food allergy setting will always be 100% accurate. We will do our best to ensure foods with allergens are filtered out, but please do not rely on this skill for that entirely. Please check the labels of your foods.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
